metadata.title: CVE-2021-46088 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: Zabbix 4.0 LTS, 4.2, 4.4, and 5.0 LTS is vulnerable to Remote CodeExecution (RCE). Any user with the "Zabbix Admin" role is able to runcustom shell script on the application server in the context of theapplication user.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
